translations: v．崇拜，把……当偶像：将某人或某物视为极度崇拜的对象。
她崇拜她最喜欢的歌手。

sentences.sentence: Jackie idolizes her math teacher and wants to be just like her.
sentences.translation: 杰姬崇拜她的数学老师，想成为和她一样的人。

sentences.sentence: He drives and works hard always trying to impress his superiors-great AUTOBOTS he idolizes above all else.
sentences.translation: 他总是努力的工作、战斗，希望给他的上级——那些他崇拜的伟大汽车人战士，留下深刻印象。
